00018 import java.util.ArrayList;
00019 import java.util.List;

00024 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.BitmapDescriptor;
00025 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng;
00026 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLngBounds;
00027 
00028 class ClusterMarker implements Marker {
00029 
00030         private int lastCount = -1;
00031 
00032         private GridClusteringStrategy strategy;
00033 
00034         private com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker virtual;
00035 
00036         private List<DelegatingMarker> markers = new ArrayList<DelegatingMarker>();
00037 
00038         public ClusterMarker(GridClusteringStrategy strategy) {
00039                 this.strategy = strategy;
00040         }
00041 
00042         com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker getVirtual() {
00043                 return virtual;
00044         }
00045 
00046         void add(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00047                 markers.add(marker);
00048         }
00049 
00050         void remove(DelegatingMarker marker) {
00051                 markers.remove(marker);
00052         }
00053 
00054         void refresh() {
00055                 int count = markers.size();
00056                 if (count == 0) {
00057                         removeVirtual();
00058                 } else if (count == 1) {
00059                         removeVirtual();
00060                         markers.get(0).changeVisible(true);
00061                 } else {
00062                         LatLngBounds.Builder builder = LatLngBounds.builder();
00063                         for (DelegatingMarker m : markers) {
00064                                 builder.include(m.getPosition());
00065                                 m.changeVisible(false);
00066                         }
00067                         LatLng position = calculateCenter(builder.build());
00068                         if (virtual == null || lastCount != count) {
00069                                 removeVirtual();
00070                                 lastCount = count;
00071                                 virtual = strategy.createMarker(new ArrayList<Marker>(markers), position);
00072                         } else {
00073                                 virtual.setPosition(position);
00074                         }
00075                 }
00076         }
00077 
00078         Marker getDisplayedMarker() {
00079                 int count = markers.size();
00080                 if (count == 0) {
00081                         return null;
00082                 } else if (count == 1) {
00083                         return markers.get(0);
00084                 } else {
00085                         return this;
00086                 }
00087         }
00088 
00089         void removeVirtual() {
00090                 if (virtual != null) {
00091                         virtual.remove();
00092                         virtual = null;
00093                 }
00094         }
00095 
00096         LatLng calculateCenter(LatLngBounds bounds) {
00097                 if (bounds.southwest.longitude > bounds.northeast.longitude) {
00098                         // TODO: incorrect
00099                         return new LatLng((bounds.southwest.latitude + bounds.northeast.latitude) / 2.0, (bounds.southwest.longitude + bounds.northeast.longitude) / 2.0);
00100                 } else {
00101                         return new LatLng((bounds.southwest.latitude + bounds.northeast.latitude) / 2.0, (bounds.southwest.longitude + bounds.northeast.longitude) / 2.0);
00102                 }
00103         }
00104 
00105         void cleanup() {
00106                 if (virtual != null) {
00107                         virtual.remove();
00108                 }
00109         }
00110 
00111         List<DelegatingMarker> getMarkersInternal() {
00112                 return new ArrayList<DelegatingMarker>(markers);
00113         }

00135         @Override
00136         public int getClusterGroup() {
00137                 if (markers.size() > 0) {
00138                         return markers.get(0).getClusterGroup();
00139                 }
00140                 throw new IllegalStateException();
00141         }

00144         public Object getData() {
00145                 return null;

00149         @Override
00150         public String getId() {
00151                 throw new UnsupportedOperationException();

00154         @Override
00155         public List<Marker> getMarkers() {
00156                 return new ArrayList<Marker>(markers);
00157         }
00158 
00159         @Override
00160         public LatLng getPosition() {
00161                 if (virtual != null) {
00162                         return virtual.getPosition();
00163                 }
00164                 LatLngBounds.Builder builder = LatLngBounds.builder();
00165                 for (DelegatingMarker m : markers) {
00166                         builder.include(m.getPosition());
00167                 }
00168                 LatLng position = calculateCenter(builder.build());
00169                 return position;
00170         }

00179                 return null;

00184                 if (virtual != null) {
00185                         virtual.hideInfoWindow();
00186                 }

00190         public boolean isCluster() {
00191                 return true;

00196                 return false;

00265         @Override
00266         public void showInfoWindow() {
00267                 if (virtual == null && markers.size() > 1) {
00268                         refresh();
00269                 }
00270                 if (virtual != null) {
00271                         virtual.showInfoWindow();
00272                 }
00273         }
00274 
00275         void setVirtualPosition(LatLng position) {
00276                 int count = markers.size();
00277                 if (count == 0) {
00278                         // no op
00279                 } else if (count == 1) {
00280                         markers.get(0).setVirtualPosition(position);
00281                 } else {
00282                         virtual.setPosition(position);
00283                 }
00284         }
